Edges-Combat -- Male Human Medieval Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Skills (29 Points):
Climbing: (str) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Swimming: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d10 Shooting: (agi) d10 Taunt: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -3 Persuasion/-3 Streetwise
Habit: -1 Charisma
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Killer Instinct: May reroll 1s and wins ties on opposed tests
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Skill: 14
Features
Edges (1 points): Block; Brawler; Bruiser; Combat Reflexes; Counterattack; Dead Shot; Dodge; Elan; Extraction; First Strike; Florentine; Frenzy; Giant Killer; Hard To Kill; Harder To Kill; Improved Block; Improved Counterattack; Improved Dodge; Improved Extraction; Improved First Strike; Improved Frenzy; Improved Level Headed; Improved Martial Artist; Improved Nerves Of Steel; Improved Sweep; Improved Trademark Weapon (Axe); Improvisational Fighter; Killer Instinct; Level Headed; Marksman; Martial Artist; Mighty Blow; Nerves Of Steel; No Mercy; Quick Draw; Rock And Roll; Steady Hands; Sweep; Trademark Weapon (Axe); Two-Fisted Hindrances: Enemy; Habit; Quirk; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Elan: +2 on Benny-purchased Trait rerolls
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 9 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Axe (+2 d8+d6); Great Axe (d8+d8 AP 1); Unarmed (+1 d8+d6+2)
Combat Notes:
Block: +2 Parry
Brawler: +2 Unarmed damage
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Great Axe Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d8
Improved Block: Increased Block effects
Improved Counterattack: Increased Counterattack effects
Improved Dodge: Increased Dodge effects
Improved Extraction: Increased Extraction effects
Improved First Strike: Increased First Strike effects
Improved Frenzy: Increased Frenzy effects
Improved Level Headed: Increased Level Headed effects
Improved Martial Artist: Increased Martial Artist effects
Improved Nerves Of Steel: Increased Nerves Of Steel effects
Improved Sweep: Increased Sweep effects
Improved Trademark Weapon (Axe): Increased Trademark Weapon effects
Martial Artist: +2 Unarmed damage step
Trademark Weapon (Axe): +2 attack with Axe
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Bruiser: Roll d8 for unarmed damage Raise
Combat Reflexes: +2 on Shaken recovery rolls
Counterattack: Free attack after failed foe attack
Dead Shot: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage from first successful ranged attack
Dodge: -2 foe ranged attacks, +2 evading area attacks
Extraction: May make Agility test to negate attack of all foes when withdrawing
First Strike: Free attack when foe moves into reach all/rd
Florentine: +1 attack vs. single-weapon foe, -1 foe Gang Up bonus
Frenzy: +1 Fighting roll/rd
Giant Killer: +1d6 damage vs. foes of size 3 or greater
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Hard To Kill: Ignores wound penalties on Vigor tests to avoid incapacitation or death
Harder To Kill: 50% chance to cheat death
Improvisational Fighter: No penalty w/improvised weapons
Level Headed: Choose best of 3 Action Cards
Marksman: Trade move for +2 ranged attack
Mighty Blow: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage on first successful melee attack
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 2 points of Wound penalties
No Mercy: May spend Benny to reroll damage
Quick Draw: Draw weapon as free action
Rock And Roll: May trade move for ignoring recoil
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform, reduce running shot penalty by 1
Sweep: May make attack on all within reach
Two-Fisted: No multi-action penalty for melee attack with each hand
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 1 available vs. 40 allocated
